eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Age requirement
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Adult males and females ≥18 years of age at Screening.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Body weight
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Body weight of ≥39 kg at Screening.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Confirmed diagnosis of primary CAgD
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Confirmed diagnosis of primary CAgD based on the following criteria: a) Chronic hemolysis b) Polyspecific direct antiglobulin test (DAT) positive c) Monospecific DAT strongly positive for C3d d) Cold agglutinin titer ≥64 at 4℃ e) IgG DAT ≤1+, and f) No overt malignant disease

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Transfusion history
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of at least one documented blood transfusion within 6 months of enrollment.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hemoglobin level
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Hemoglobin level ≤10.0 g/dL.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Bilirubin level
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Bilirubin level above the normal reference range, including patients with Gilbert’s Syndrome.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Ferritin levels
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Ferritin levels above the lower limit of normal. Concurrent treatment with iron supplementation is permitted if the patient has been on a stable dose during the previous 4 weeks.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: CAgD-related signs or symptoms
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Presence of one or more of the following CAgD-related signs or symptoms within 3 months of Screening: a) Symptomatic anemia defined as: i. Fatigue ii. Weakness iii. Shortness of breath iv. Palpitations, fast heart beat v. Light headedness and/or vi. Chest pain b) Acrocyanosis c) Raynaud’s syndrome d) Hemoglobinuria e) Disabling circulatory symptoms, and/or f) Major adverse vascular event (including thrombosis).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Bone marrow biopsy
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Bone marrow biopsy within 6 months of Screening with no overt evidence of lymphoproliferative disease or other hematological malignancy. An additional bone marrow biopsy will be required if the prior bone marrow is deemed unsuitable for analysis by the Sponsor.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Vaccinations
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Documented vaccinations against encapsulated bacterial pathogens (Neisseria meningitis, including serogroup B meningococcus where available, Haemophilus influenzae, and Streptococcus pneumoniae) within 5 years of enrollment or as specified in Section 6.1.1.1.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: IV access
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Adequate IV access.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Female contraception
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: If female, must be post-menopausal, surgically sterile, or be established on (≥3 months prior to Screening) and agree to continue to use the same highly effective methods of birth control throughout the study and for 9 weeks following administration of the last dose of study drug.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Male contraception
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Males must be surgically sterile for at least 90 days or when sexually active with female partners of child-bearing potential will agree to use highly effective contraception from Day 0 until 9 weeks following administration of the last dose of study drug.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Informed consent
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Able to comprehend and give informed consent.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Compliance
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Able to comply with the requirements of the study and to complete the full sequence of protocol-related procedures.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Secondary CAS exclusion
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Cold agglutinin syndrome secondary to infection, rheumatologic disease, or active hematologic malignancy.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Clinically relevant infection
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Clinically relevant infection of any kind within the month preceding enrollment (eg, active hepatitis C, pneumonia).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: SLE or autoimmune disorders
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Clinical diagnosis of systemic lupus erythematosus (SLE) or other autoimmune disorders with anti-nuclear antibodies at Screening. Anti-nuclear antibodies of long-standing duration without associated clinical symptoms will be adjudicated on a case-by-case basis during the Confirmatory Review of Patient Eligibility (Section 6.1.1.3).

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hepatitis panel
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Positive hepatitis panel (including hepatitis B surface antigen and/or hepatitis C virus antibody) prior to or at Screening.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: HIV antibody
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Positive human immunodeficiency virus (HIV) antibody at Screening.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Rituximab treatment
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Treatment with rituximab monotherapy within 3 months or rituximab combination therapies (eg, with bendamustine, fludarabine, ibrutinib, or cytotoxic drugs) within 6 months prior to enrollment.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Corticosteroids
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Concurrent treatment with corticosteroids other than a stable daily dose equivalent to ≤10 mg/day prednisone for previous 3 months.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Erythropoietin deficiency
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Erythropoietin deficiency. Concurrent treatment with erythropoietin is permitted if the patient has been on a stable dose for the previous 3 months.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Iron supplementation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Concurrent usage of iron supplementation unless the patient has been on a stable dose for at least 4 weeks.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Significant medical history
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Clinically significant medical history or ongoing chronic illness that would jeopardize the safety of the patient or compromise the quality of the data derived from his/her participation in this study (as determined by the Investigator [or designee]) at Screening.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Experimental drugs
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Concurrent treatment with other experimental drugs or participation in another clinical trial with any investigational drug within 30 days or 5 half-lives, whichever is greater, prior to treatment start.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Pregnancy or lactation
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: Females who are pregnant, lactating, or, if having reproductive potential, are considered potentially unreliable with respect to contraceptive practice.

eligibilityCriterionItems.name: Hypersensitivity
eligibilityCriterionItems.text: History of hypersensitivity to BIVV009 or any of its components.
